data.title: Track company-wide progress
data.description: See how your day-to-day tasks fit into the wider vision.Go from tracking progress at the milestone level all theway done to the smallest of details, Never lose sight ofthe bigger picture again.

data.title: Advanced built-in reports

data.title: Everything you need in one place
data.description: Stop jumping from one service to another tocommunicate, store files, track tasks and share documents, Manage offers an all-in-one team productivity solution.
